text: @WhiteHouse Those "liberal pet projects" you refer to include funding for hospitals that are treating COVID-19 patients and for first responders who are threatened with being furloughed due to their cities funds being depleted due to COVID-19 outbreaks. Your 1-page approach is lacking.
